items.title: US chess grandmaster Daniel Naroditsky dies aged 29
items.description: The young prodigy's "unexpected passing" was announced by his family on Monday.

items.title: Ecuador releases survivor of US strike on 'drug sub' in Caribbean
items.description: Ecuadorian officials say they found no evidence the man had committed a crime, and so had freed him.

items.title: Slovak PM Fico's attacker sentenced to 21 years in prison
items.description: Juraj Cintula - who fired five shots at close range at the prime minister - was found guilty of terrorism charges.

items.title: Meet Japan's drum-playing, Thatcher-loving first female prime minister
items.description: The conservative politician, who sees Margaret Thatcher as an inspiration, has become Japan's first female prime minister.

items.title: Japan's first female leader: A historic moment with caveats
items.description: Sanae Takaichi, Japan's first female prime minister, is not known for progressive views on women's equality.
